name: The Mystery of Markham Manor
description:
"Well", said Sam "This is a little bit awkward"

"What do mean Sam?" I asked.

"You've just released the story of my second case that took place in Markham Hall."

"Yes", I replied puzzled.

"Well, you called it 'The Mystery of Markham Hall', but there is already a game with a very similar name."

"Don't be silly" I replied "I'm sure there isn't". I went off to look.

"You're right Sam", I said, "Maybe no one will notice."

"Of course I'm right, I'm Sam Boon. Oh and I bet you a dollar someone has already noticed."

Welcome to Markham Hall, home to Sam's latest adventure and the first to complete production using DAAD in the first step to support his adventures on a wider range of machines.
